artists.about: I am a young Persian artist, with a passion for drawing mandalas. I specialize in traditional Persian patterns and symbols, and my intricate works evoke reflection and introspection. I am constantly pushing the boundaries of mandala art and exploring new possibilities in this meditative art form. I am excited to share my art with the world and see where my talent will take me in the future.

items.name: Verdant
items.description: This mandala art piece is created with vibrant hues of blue, green, and yellow using fine-tipped markers and a compass for precision geometric shapes.

items.name: Sapphire Blaze
items.description: Handpainted mandala art with a vibrant color palette and intricate patterns created using fine brushwork for a mesmerizing and harmonious masterpiece

items.name: Rainbow Hues
items.description: Elegant handpainted mandala art with a subtle color palette and delicate patterns created using a fine brush and ink for a serene masterpiece

items.name: Yin Yang
items.description: Intricate handpainted mandala art featuring a harmonious blend of colors and patterns crafted using traditional persian painting techniques

items.name: Oceanic Opulence
items.description: Handpainted mandala art with bold hues and geometric patterns created using stencils and a variety of mark-making tools for a striking visual impact

items.name: Gilded Bordeaux
items.description: This mandala art piece is created with vibrant hues of blue, gold, and red using fine-tipped markers and a compass for precision geometric shapes.
